data.text: @siobhan_solo Hang in there! My friend felt bad for 2 days but was fine on the third, so I hope tomorrow is great for you! I'll be in the same boat later this month.
@jfeintuch UGH thank you. I don’t feel totally fine today, alas, but I AM back in the world as best as I can be!!
@siobhan_solo I also had a rough day after the second shot, but the day after that I was totally fine. Hoping you feel better tomorrow ❤️
